survey.description:
This is a generic survey that can be used as the base for assessments of Land Use, Land Use Change and Forestry (LULUCF) that are compliant with the IPCC guidelines.
Notice that you will need to adapt the Land Use Subdivisions ( in the land_use code in the Code Lists view). Please do not change the names/codes of the main categories (Forest, Grassland, Settlement...) only add the right subdivisions to the region/country you are assessing.
This survey is also adapted to be used in conjunction with the ALU software (http://www.nrel.colostate.edu/projects/ALUsoftware/) in order to be able to produce the data for the Land Use segment of a Green House Gas inventory following the IPCC 2006 guidelines.
In this survey there are also elements for evaluating the accessibility of the plots. This survey could be used in a two-phased forest inventory in which for the first phase the accessibility and type of forest is assessed and the second phase (field visit) is designed taking these factors into account.
For more information or questions post a question in the forum : www.openforis.org/support

list.name: ecological_zones
list.label: Ecological zone
Ecological zones
list.description: These are the default FAO GEZ ( download here: http://www.fao.org/geonetwork/srv/en/resources.get?id=47105&fname=gez2010.zip&access=private - more info http://www.fao.org/docrep/017/ap861e/ap861e00.pdf ) ecological zones that are used as the standard classes in the GHG inventory software ALU (http://www.nrel.colostate.edu/projects/ALUsoftware/).

list.name: soil_types
list.label: Soil Types
list.description: Soil classes that are consistent with the IPCC defaults expected by ALU. You can obtain this data from : http://www.isric.org/content/download-form?dataset=CBP_Global_IPCC_soil_classes_2010Nov04.zip

list.name: climate_zones
list.label: Climate Zone
list.description: These are the IPCC default climate zones as expected by the ALU tool, the dataset that can be used is hosted at http://esdac.jrc.ec.europa.eu/projects/renewable-energy-directive

spatialReferenceSystem.label: EPSG:4326
spatialReferenceSystem.description: EPSG:World Geodetic System 1984 Horizontal component of 3D system. Used by the GPS satellite navigation system and for NATO military geodetic surveying.
spatialReferenceSystem.wkt: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

boolean.name: land_use_category_accuracy
boolean.label: Land Use Category - Confidence
boolean.description: Is the user confident that the assessed Land Use category is the actual Land Use on the plot?

boolean.name: land_use_subcategory_accuracy
boolean.label: Land Use Conversion - Confidence
boolean.description: Is the user confident that the assessed Land Use conversion is correct?

boolean.name: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change_know
boolean.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_subcategory!='GLtoGL' and land_use_subcategory!='FLtoFL' and land_use_subcategory!='SLtoSL' and land_use_subcategory!='OTtoOT' and land_use_subcategory!='WLtoWL' and land_use_subcategory!='CLtoCL'
boolean.label: Land Use Change - Known year of change
boolean.description: Is it possible to asses the year in which the Land Use has changed?

number.name: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change
number.relevant: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change_know=true() and land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_subcategory!='GLtoGL' and land_use_subcategory!='FLtoFL' and land_use_subcategory!='SLtoSL' and land_use_subcategory!='OTtoOT' and land_use_subcategory!='WLtoWL' and land_use_subcategory!='CLtoCL'
number.label: Land Use Change - Year of change

boolean.name: land_use_subdivision_change
boolean.relevant: land_use_subcategory='GLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoSL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoCL'
boolean.label: Has the Sub-Division changed?

default.if: land_use_subcategory='FLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoSL'
land_use_subcategory='CLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoSL'
land_use_subcategory='GLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='GLtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='GLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='GLtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='GLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='GLtoSL'
land_use_subcategory='SLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoSL'
land_use_subcategory='OTtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoSL'
land_use_subcategory='WLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoCL' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoSL'

code.name: site_accessibility
code.label: Accessibility
code.description: This is used to measure the difficulty for a field visit to the plot.

code.name: site_bearing
code.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_category!='settlement' and land_use_category!='cropland' and site_accessibility!='inaccesible' and site_accessibility!='0-1'
code.label: Bearing
code.description: Direction that the road/path/river used to access the plot is FROM the plot.

code.name: human_impact_grade
code.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_category!='cropland' and land_use_category!='settlement' and human_impact_type!='none'
code.label: Grade
code.description: Grade of the human impact, this is only relevant for Forest, Grassland and Otherland plots.

boolean.name: continuous_human_impact
boolean.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_category!='cropland' and land_use_category!='settlement' and human_impact_type!='none'
boolean.label: Is the disturbance continuous?
boolean.description: For instance grazing is a continuous impact while for instance clear cutting is an specific disturbance for which the date can be assessed.

number.name: human_impact_year
number.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_category!='cropland' and land_use_category!='settlement' and human_impact_type!='none'and continuous_human_impact=false()
number.label: Year of the disturbance

boolean.name: human_impact_accuracy
boolean.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_category!='cropland' and land_use_category!='settlement' and human_impact_type!='none'
boolean.label: Interpretation Confidence
boolean.description: How confident is the user that the human impact actually happened.

boolean.name: more_than_thirty_trees
boolean.label: More than thirty trees in plot?
boolean.description: This should be hidden when the user chooses the "Forest" land use. Using this attribute and the "Number of trees in the plot" it is possible to estimate the number of trees outside the forest in the region.

compare.message: The number of trees in the plot in non-forest categories should not exceed 30

code.name: land_use_initial_subdivision
code.label: Previous Land Use Subdivision

number.name: land_use_subdivision_year_of_change
number.relevant: land_use_subdivision_change=true() and (land_use_subcategory='GLtoGL' or land_use_subcategory='FLtoFL' or land_use_subcategory='SLtoSL' or land_use_subcategory='OTtoOT' or land_use_subcategory='WLtoWL' or land_use_subcategory='CLtoCL')
number.label: Year of the Sub-Division change

text.name: plot_file
text.label: CSV file that contains the plot
